titleStmt.title: London's plague-sore discovered. or, Some serious notes and suitable considerations upon the present visitation at London wherein is something by way of lamentation, information, expostulation, exhortation and caution : whereunto is annexed, A never-failing antidote against the plague.
titleStmt.author: E. N.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
